scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises letters to John Wesley Hunt of Lexington, Kentucky, from business associates; land grants; trade receipts documenting John W. Hunt's deliveries of yarn and bales of hemp to James Adams; and a statement of John W. Hunt's account with L. and George Young. Letters discuss scarce goods and rising prices, money, debts, and shipments of goods. Both land grants give Joshua Gates a tract of land in Christian County, Kentucky, and are signed by Governor Isaac Shelby.
